author: aber_james
title: Good value and location for Paris -
text:
I enjoyed a short stay on business at the Mercure Paris Opera Grands Boulevards.
The room was small (this is Paris...) but was clean and tidy. Staff welcoming and friendly.
The wifi worked reliably which was good for working.
Lots of options to eat nearby. Area is served by a number of Metro lines making getting around Paris easy. Use the app to journey plan to figure out which of the nearby stations to begin from.
